code: import axios from"axios";export function setTokenHeader(token){if(token){axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"]="Bearer ".concat(token);}else{delete axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"];}}export function apiCall(method,path,data){if(data)console.log("method: "+method+" data: "+Object.keys(data));return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){return axios[method](path,data).then(function(res){return resolve(res.data);}).catch(function(err){return reject(err.response.data.error);});});}
